name: @cocalc/landing-free
description: Landing pages for the free version of CoCalc.

scripts.cocalc-prod: export BASE_PATH=/$COCALC_PROJECT_ID/port/3000 && next build && next start
scripts.project-dev: unset PGHOST PGUSER COCALC_ROOT; export PORT=5000 BASE_PATH=/$COCALC_PROJECT_ID/port/5000; echo https://cocalc.com$BASE_PATH; npm run dev
scripts.build: rm -rf .next/cache/webpack/*development* && npm run build-dist && next build
scripts.project-build: npm run build-dist && BASE_PATH=/$COCALC_PROJECT_ID/port/5000 next build
scripts.clean: rm -rf .next dist && npx next telemetry disable

author: SageMath, Inc.
dependencies-comment: IMPORTANT: we install typescript as a normal dependency since it may be needed at runtime due to server settings changing!!
